pages.text: $(item)Brooms$() are magical devices commonly used by witches. Through the use of $(marked)ME$(), they enable the user to fly through the skies.$(br2)Brooms come in four variants, each with unique properties.
$(item)Juniper Brooms$() are the fastest of all brooms, without any other special properties.
$(item)Cypress Brooms$() ward the user, reducing both damage input and output.
$(item)Elder Brooms$() will return the user to where they mounted it after dismounting.

$(item)Dragon's Blood Brooms$() can have $(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)active sigils$() applied to them, much like any other $(l:bewitchment:introduction/dragons_blood_trees)Dragon's Blood$() block.
